sentence: “Throughout his entire career, Josh Shapiro has worked to defend Pennsylvanians’ constitutional right to clean air and pure water,” said Will Simons, Shapiro’s campaign spokesperson.
author: Susan Phillips
title: Mariner East pipeline motivates activist’s Green Party run for Pa. governor
